pluginstrument.description:
Piper PA34 Seneca V Gauge built based on Carenado Piper Seneca V -------------------------------------------------------- V2 - 20/02/2018 Updated to AM 3.2. No longer use LVAR for OAT, Select and Control buttons. Fixed the timer clock. Added Arduino code for external push button for OAT, Select and Control buttons. --------------------------------------------------------
